figtree.treeviewer
Class ReRootedTree

java.lang.Object
  figtree.treeviewer.ReRootedTree
All Implemented Interfaces:
jebl.evolution.graphs.Graph, jebl.evolution.trees.RootedTree, jebl.evolution.trees.Tree, jebl.util.Attributable
public final class ReRootedTree
extends java.lang.Object
implements jebl.evolution.trees.RootedTree

A rooted tree concrete class that wraps another tree and provides a differently rooted view of that tree.

Version:
$Id$
Author:
Andrew Rambaut

rootTreeAtCenter

public static jebl.evolution.trees.RootedTree rootTreeAtCenter(jebl.evolution.trees.RootedTree tree)
Root any tree by locating the "center" of tree and adding a new root node at that point

for any point on the tree x let D(x) = Max{distance between x and t : for all tips t} The "center" c is the point with the smallest distance, i.e. D(c) = min{ D(x) : x in tree }

Parameters:
tree - to root
Returns:
rooted tree
